column5: This listing is a combination of 2 listings - the downstairs unit is 500 sqft and has full amenities. The listing is found here https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/15700427 - Modern 800 sf Shipping Container Apt Near W7th. This listing combines both of the above listings.
